citations.narrative:
The indoor enclosure housing one, 4-month-old coatimundi, contained an elevated, carpeted wood platform with areas of
heavily worn and frayed carpeting with long, thin strings. The enclosure also had three wooden, bird-type perches, each
about 1inch in diameter, located approximately 4 feet above the ground. Additionally, there were three circular wire bowl
holders, each about 6 inches in diameter fastened to the sides of the enclosure and located approximately 4 feet above
the ground. Worn and frayed carpeting poses a risk of potential foreign body ingestion to the animal. Elevated, small
round perches or elevated circular metal wires are not appropriate materials for this species to climb onto and could
cause animal injury. The indoor and outdoor housing facilities must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to
protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals.
Correct by 11/25/2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The indoor enclosure housing one, 4-month-old coatimundi, contained an elevated, carpeted wood platform with areas of 
heavily worn and frayed carpeting with long, thin strings. The enclosure also had three wooden, bird-type perches, each 
about 1inch in diameter, located approximately 4 feet above the ground. Additionally, there were three circular wire bowl 
holders, each about 6 inches in diameter fastened to the sides of the enclosure and located approximately 4 feet above 
the ground. Worn and frayed carpeting poses a risk of potential foreign body ingestion to the animal. Elevated, small 
round perches or elevated circular metal wires are not appropriate materials for this species to climb onto and could 
cause animal injury. The indoor and outdoor housing facilities must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to 
protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals. 
 
Correct by 11/25/2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
